page.title: 12PRINCES RISBOROUGH BY-PASS
page.content: Before the By-Pass of Princes Risborough the main road ran through the very narrow, High Street, and this meant that cars were rushing through the High Street where all the shops and Pedestrians were. The Road Scheme was though of about 30 years ago but was only started just over a year ago. When the by-pass was finished, the traffic coming from the north or south would have to go through two roundabouts, and go round the back of the high street. This has greatly cut down the traffic congestion through the high street. The main Shops have also been moved from the high street, elsewhere so now very little traffic comes through for the shops that are in the High Street.
